roleset.name: equal, be the same as
roleset.note: EQUAL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'equal' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry (except 'equalize', which isjust 'make equal'). Comparison with 'match'. (from equal.01-vpredicate notes)
EQUALITY-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to equal.01. No VN class. Framed by Katie. Updated by Claire forsymmetry with verb relation. (from equal.01-j)

role.descr: attribute, quality, domain in which two things are equal

example.name: topic/comment
example.text: The latest quarter's loss equals $9.92 a share.

example.name: both args
example.text: Right kidney size is roughly equal to left.

example.name: Equal things in one mention, with attribute
example.text: I think you are answering if two men are the " same " and not necessarily if they are equal in rights.

roleset.name: be up to the task
roleset.note: EQUAL-J NOTES: Roleset must have been copied over at some point-- reframed by Julia 5/20/15.

example.name: both args
example.text: Therefore, a fresh dilemma must be produced, and Fielding is equal to the challenge.

roleset.name: make equal
roleset.note: EQUALIZE-V NOTES: Edited by hwangd (from equalize.01-v)

example.name: Active
example.text: I equalized the exposures using the eyedropper tool in Photoshop.
example.arg: using the eyedropper tool in Photoshop
